featured.text: Due to numerous accidents that occurred while people were playing Pokémon GO, players were advised to be _____ of possible dangers in the environment.

definition.zh_def: 口袋妖怪，指一種虛構的生物，出現在電子遊戲、動畫和漫畫中，玩家可以捕捉、訓練和戰鬥。
definition.en_def: A fictional creature from a franchise that includes video games, animated series, and comics, where players can capture, train, and battle them.
definition.example: In the game, you can catch various Pokémon to build your team.
